release_name: Phase A: Universal SDR Detection with SoapySDR
release_notes: Phase A: Enhanced SDR detection with SoapySDR support. Detects ALL SDR types (RTL-SDR, Airspy, HackRF, LimeSDR, etc.) with graceful fallback to rtl_test. Displays driver type and device labels in wizard. Configuration still uses native drivers (no behavior change). Foundation for future SoapySDR runtime support.
